official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to initiate a rehabilitation and betterment program for the Post Falls irrigation district, Rathdrum Prairie Project, Idaho.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to initiate a rehabilitation and betterment program for the Post Falls Irrigation District, Rathdrum Prairie project, Idaho.
